summary: DT: THE CONTACT RECEIVED  RECALL 05V379 CONCERNING ABS BRAKES. THE ABS SYSTEM WAS CLEANED PREVIOUSLY AND THE SENSOR WAS REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY. HE WAS EXPERIENCING  THE PROBLEMS AGAIN.  THEREFORE,  HE FELT  THE RECALL REMEDY WAS ONLY A TEMPORARY SOLUTION.  GENERAL MOTORS SHOULD OFFER A PERMANENT SOLUTION. AN APPOINTMENT HAS BEEN MADE FOR HAVING THE RECALL WORK COMPLETED AT THIS TIME. *AK
